name: The Heavenly Zoo
description:
The first public build of The Heavenly Zoo, a puzzle-platforming adventure made by The Great Sage Games. 

The Heavenly Zoo chronicles the solitary adventures of one lonely robot in space. On the way, he might at least make a friend. Hover and hoover your way through the world, bouncing wildly from great heights and jumping more precisely across the smaller gaps. Collect postcards and see if you can piece together what went so wrong aboard this ship.

Credits:

Produced and managed by Uche Okorie

Design work and programming by Dat Bui

Programming and quality assurance work by Dan David

Programming and narrative work by Bradley Dean

Art, UI & narrative work by Lenore Linsell
